1.085 Pelajar Yatim Piatu, Difable dan Hafiz Al Qur'an di Jember Dilayani Angkutan Gratis
05 Nov 2019, 15:11 by Gandhi Luqmanto


1.085 Pelajar Yatim Piatu, Difable dan Hafiz Al Qur'an di Jember Dilayani Angkutan Gratis

KBRN, Jember: Pemerintah Kabupaten Jember melalui Dinas Perhubungan setempat melauncing layanan angkutan gratis untuk pelajar tertentu 2019, Selasa (5/11/2019). Pemerintah Daerah mengalokasikan anggaran sebesar Rp 1 Milyar rupiah untuk menunjang realisasi program itu. "Program ini menjadi bagian dari pelaksanaan program pendidikan gratis di kabupaten Jember, dan salah satu kendala yang banyak dikeluhkan adalah akses menuju sekolah bagi siswa yang rumahnya jauh dan ada di plosok, oleh karenanya kita juga fasilitasi dengan penyediaan sarana prasarana penunjang dengan layanan angkutan transportasi gratis yang diberikan Pemkab Jember agar tidak sampai putus sekolah," ujar Bupati Jember Faida, Selasa (5/11/2019). Untuk tahap awal, ada sebanyak 1.085 siswa dari kelompok yatim dan piatu, siswa difable serta siswa Hafiz Al quran yang sebelumnya telah menjalani verifikasi dan telah memperoleh hak untuk memperoleh pendidikan gratis dan beasiswa dari pemerintah daerah."Ini masih tahap pertama dan masih kita uji coba karena belum seluruh pelosok ada angkutan massalnya baik berupa ojek, angkutan kota maupun angkutan pedesaan," tandas Bupati Faida.  Angkutan gratis bagi pelajar ini akan beroperasi mulai pukul 06.00 sd 08.00 WIB dan waktu pulang sekolah yakni 14.00 hingga 16.00 WIB. Pelajar akan diberikan karcis khusus agar mereka mendapat fasilitas angkutan gratis yang disediakan oleh Dinas Perhubungan Kabupaten Jember.Sedangkan penukaran karcis bagi jasa angkutan akan dilayani hari kerja, yakni untuk angkot dan angkudes untuk shift 1 yakni pukul 09.00 sd 10.00 WIB dan shift 2 yakni pukul 12.00 sd 13.00 WIB. Untuk ojek pangkalan shift 1 pukul 08.00 sd 09.00 WIB dan shift 2 yakni pukul 11.00 sd 12.00 WIB. "Dishub Jember akan menyediakan tempat penukaran karcis di Terminal Tawang Alun dan 8 sub terminal di Kabupaten Jember, yakni Pakusari, AJung, Balung, Puger, Tanggul, Kalisat, Sempolan dan Sukowono," pungkas Faida.

1,085 Orphan Students, Difable and Hafiz Al Qur'an in Jember Served by Free Transportation
05 Nov 2019, 15:11 by Gandhi Luqmanto


1,085 Orphan Students, Difable and Hafiz Al Qur'an in Jember Served by Free Transportation

KBRN, Jember: The Government of Jember Regency through the local Department of Transportation launched a free transportation service for certain students in 2019, Tuesday (11/05/2019). The local government has allocated a budget of Rp. 1 billion to support the realization of the program. "This program is part of the implementation of the free education program in Jember district, and one of the obstacles that is often complained about is the access to schools for students whose homes are far away and in remote areas, therefore we also facilitate the provision of supporting infrastructure with free transportation services. given by the Jember Regency Government so as not to drop out of school, "said Jember Regent Faida, Tuesday (11/05/2019). For the initial stage, there are 1,085 students from orphan and orphan groups, disabled students and Hafiz Al quran students who have previously undergone verification and have obtained the right to obtain free education and scholarships from the local government. "This is still the first stage and we are still testing it because not all corners have mass transportation either in the form of motorcycle taxis, city transportation or rural transportation, "said Regent Faida. Free transportation for these students will operate from 06.00 to 08.00 WIB and the time to go home from school is 14.00 to 16.00 WIB. Students will be given a special ticket so that they get free transportation facilities provided by the Department of Transportation of Jember Regency. While the ticket exchange for transportation services will be served on weekdays, namely for angkot and angkudes for shift 1, which is 09.00 to 10:00 WIB and shift 2 is 12.00 until 1:00 p.m. WIB For base 1 motorcycle taxi shift at 08.00 till 09.00 WIB and shift 2, which is 11.00 till 12.00 WIB. "Jember Transportation Agency will provide ticket exchanges at Tawang Alun Terminal and 8 sub-terminals in Jember Regency, namely Pakusari, AJung, Balung, Puger, Embankment, Kalisat, Sempolan and Sukowono," concluded Faida.
